api.title: API Documentation
api.subtitle: Integrate email sending via HTTP RESTful API
api.ai.title: AI Integration Prompt
api.ai.desc: Copy the prompt below to ChatGPT, Claude, or Cursor to let AI write the integration code for you.
api.ai.prompt_template:
Hello, I am developing a project and need to integrate email sending functionality. Please write a working code snippet based on the following API documentation. [API Info] - Name: GoEmail Pro Send API - Base URL: {base_url} - Path: POST /send - Auth: Bearer Token - Header: Authorization: Bearer - Header: Content-Type: application/json [Request Body (JSON)] { "to": "recipient@example.com", // [Required] Recipient Email "subject": "Email Subject", // [Cond. Required] Optional if template_id is used "body": "

Hello

", // [Cond. Required] Optional if template_id is used "template_id": 1, // [Optional] Template ID (Overrides subject/body) "variables": { // [Optional] Template variables (JSON Object) "name": "User", "code": "123456" }, "from": "sender@example.com", // [Optional] Sender (Default if empty) "channel_id": 0, // [Optional] SMTP Channel ID (0=Auto Routing) "attachments": [ // [Optional] Attachments { "filename": "invoice.pdf", "content": "JVBERi0xLjQK...", // [Optional] Base64 content "url": "https://example.com/f.pdf", // [Optional] Remote URL (Auto download) "content_type": "application/pdf" } ] } [Requirements] 1. Write a wrapper function using [Python/Java/Node.js/PHP/Go] language. 2. Handle exceptions (e.g. timeout, auth failure). 3. If attachments contain local file paths, read file and convert to Base64 automatically. 4. Provide a usage example.
api.ai.usage: ðŸ’¡ Usage: Copy the content above to ChatGPT/Claude, replacing [Python/Java...] with your programming language.
api.auth.title: Authentication
api.auth.desc:
Please go to API Keys page to generate a permanent API Key (starts with sk_live_).
All API requests must include in HTTP Header:
api.contacts.title: Contact Management
api.send.title: Send Email API
api.param.subject: Email Subject
api.param.body: Email Content. Required if template_id is not provided.
api.param.template_id: Use Template ID. Overrides subject/body if provided, supports variable substitution.
api.param.channel_id: Specific SMTP Channel ID (0 or empty for Auto/Direct, >0 for specific SMTP config ID)
api.tpl.title: List Templates
